name: Web-firewall
tagline: The firewall project for mitigating HTTP Layer 7 DDoS attack through PHP.
body:
### Welcome to the Web-Firewall page.

The Web-Firewall is a lightweight project for protecting common home-hosted servers, using iptables or cloudflare if available.
Currently supported:
Debian GNU/Linux
Apache 2.24
PHP 5.6.7+dfsg-1


To download, do.
```
$ git clone https://GitHub.com/HoleInTheWall/Web-Firewall
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
